name: bandcamp_search
description: Search Bandcamp for artists, albums, tracks, fans, and labels. Returns matching results with type, name, URL, image, genre, and tags.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query (e.g. 'aphex twin', 'lo-fi hip hop', 'indie label')

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.result-items li.searchresult').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const info = el.querySelector('.result-info'); const titleEl = info?.querySelector('.heading a'); const typeEl = info?.querySelector('.itemtype'); const urlEl = info?.querySelector('.itemurl a'); const subheadEl = info?.querySelector('.subhead'); const genreEl = info?.querySelector('.genre'); const tagsEl = info?.querySelector('.tags'); const releasedEl = info?.querySelector('.released'); const artEl = el.querySelector('.art img'); results.push({ name: titleEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: urlEl?.textContent?.trim() || titleEl?.href || '', type: typeEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', subhead: subheadEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', genre: genreEl?.textContent?.trim().replace(/^genre:\s*/i, '') || '', tags: tagsEl?.textContent?.trim().replace(/^tags:\s*/i, '') || '', released: releasedEl?.textContent?.trim().replace(/^released\s*/i, '') || '', image: artEl?.src || '' }); } }); return { query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results };
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract results
